location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 28/1 Persian Gulf Residency Bushire Office Records. Births, Marriages & Deaths, Correspondence of'

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order.

Foliation: the foliation is in pencil, encircled, in the top right corner of the recto of each folio. The numbering begins on the front cover, on number 1, then 2-14; 15 and 15A; and ends on the inside of the back cover, on number 48.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence and telegrams between the Political Agent at Bahrain, the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, the State Department in Washington and several individuals interested in regard to births and marriages of British and American nationals in Bahrain.
